title: website Updates
body:
Hey guys, even if you're not a rioter.

The oce website needs updating, for example under the summoners rift section it still shows the old baron and drag. Although this might seem small, it is an annoying thing that you might want to fix, as newbies might be confused when they join the game.


Cheers.


and feel free to add more outdated things below

replies.body: There's a really long list of things they don't keep updated to reflect what's actually in game. Did you know that all the banners for what League you are in (Xerath's Blade, Katarina's Assassins, etc.) uses the first splash art of that champion?
